ygData.subject: Re: I'm a mob magnet...
ygData.msgSnippet: Aren t I full of questions today. The same time I was realizing chaotic feedback was doing less damage sometimes, I found out that even if I stand away from
ygData.messageBody:
Aren't I full of questions today.

The same time I was realizing chaotic feedback was doing less damage
sometimes, I found out that even if I stand away from the fight, the mob
switches targest and goes after me.

One fight, I stood really far away and this spider almost totally dead came
after me and killed me.

How far away do you have to stand for it to not switch targets?

Is the trick just to root everything?

I'm an erudite, if that makes any difference.

Thanks

Azboklin the enchanter who hopes one day to know more stuff and have less
questions

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Scott Murawski scott.murawski@...
